About ViPR Data Services SDK for Java

The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
ViPR S3 Client for Java This project extends the Amazon S3 client to add ViPR extended functionality.
ViPR S3 Client Samples Sample applications that use the ViPR S3 extensions library.
Custom jersey-apache-httpclient4 This is a custom build of the httpclient4 provider for jersey that supports preemptive proxy authorization.
ViPR Atmos Client for Java This project implements the EMC Atmos Client
ViPR Data Services Common Library Common library functions for ViPR Data Services (e.g. test utils, etc)
ViPR Object Transformations Implements generic compression and encryption functionality for the ViPR object SDKs.
atmos-sync The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
acdp-provisioning-tool The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
acdp-report-generator The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
atmos-cleanup The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
atmos-threaded-download The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
directory-monitor The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
orphaned-user-tool The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
Sample applications and tools using atmos-client The ViPR Data Services SDK for Java provides Java APIs that include the enhanced functionality of ViPR data services.
